shortcv.p: Alexandros Tsiaousis holds a Bachelor Degree in International and European Economic and Political Studies from the University of Macedonia, Greece. His Bachelor dissertation regarded: The multi-dimensional transition from Geopolitics to Geoconomy in Europe, He has also been awarded with an MSc in Information Technology from the University of Glasgow (UK). His MSc dissertation was: GLAP: An MSc IT Material Search engine for MSc students. Mr. Tsiaousis is currently studying towards his PhD in mobile Human Computer Interaction (HCI) at the Department of Management Science and Technology of Athens University of Economics and Business (GR). His main interests lie in the area of the latest developments in 3G mobile phones.
